text: Year 9 BC was either a common year starting on Wednesday, Thursday or Friday or a leap year starting on Thursday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Drusus and Crispinus. == Events == * Pannonia is added to the Roman Empire. It is made part of Illyria. * Nero Claudius Drusus begins to fight against the Marcomanni * Tiberius Claudius Nero continues the conquest of Germania == Births == * Emperor Ping of Han (d. AD 6) * Claudius Livius Fresius (d. AD 57) == Deaths == * Nero Claudius Drusus, (b. 38 BC)
title: 9 BC
